column5: We were to Lac Seul the 3rd week in July. When cleaning walleye and northern thier stomachs were full of crayfish. Can you use crayfish for bait and if so where can you get crayfish bait? If not legal to use what is a good crayfish lure to use?
We troll small Hot n tots (with metal lip) in crayfish color. Works well when the fish are feeding on that forage.
